actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Clean Air Act to prohibit the Federal government from requiring State plans to mandate trip reduction measures.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to provide that revisions of State implementation plans that provide for transportation control measures for Serious ozone nonattainment areas shall not be required to include trip reduction ordinances.

titles.title: To amend the Clean Air Act to prohibit the Federal government from requiring State plans to mandate trip reduction measures.
